name: Appointment Reminder Chain
description: Multi-level appointment reminder system: immediate confirmation, 24-hour reminder, 2-hour reminder, and post-appointment feedback. Reduces no-shows and improves patient satisfaction for clinics and healthcare providers.

params.description: Triggers when a new appointment is added to the calendar
Daily check at 9 AM for appointments tomorrow
Check every 30 minutes for appointments in 2 hours
Sent to waitlist when slot opens
